languages.text: {n}Глумливый смех прерывает вас.{/n} "Довольно слов, Домин'{name}, избавь свою слугу от постыдного существования. Ты явил{mf|ся|ась} в час отчаяния, и это — знак Неумирающего. Лишь тебе под силу принести той, что звалась Кибеллой, окончательную смерть".

{n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."
languages.original_text: {n}Глумливый смех прерывает вас.{/n} "Довольно слов, Домин'{name}, избавь свою слугу от постыдного существования. Ты явил{mf|ся|ась} в час отчаяния, и это — знак Неумирающего. Лишь тебе под силу принести той, что звалась Кибеллой, окончательную смерть".

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

traits.locale_text: "Enough words, Enim'{name}. Rid your blades of their shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant us our final death." {n}The other figures nod in agreement.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

traits.locale_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Una carcajada jactanciosa te interrumpe.{/n} «Basta de palabras, Domin'{name}. Libre a su sirvienta de su vergonzosa existencia. Ha acudido en nuestro momento más desesperado, y eso es una señal del Inmortal. Solo usted puede otorgar la muerte final a quien antaño llamó Kibellah».
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una carcajada jactanciosa te interrumpe.{/n} «Basta de palabras, Domin'{name}. Libre a su sirvienta de su vergonzosa existencia. Ha acudido en nuestro momento más desesperado, y eso es una señal del Inmortal. Solo usted puede otorgar la muerte final a quien antaño llamó Kibellah».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}楽しげな笑い声が邪魔をする。{/n}「言葉はもう十分です、ドミン・{name}。恥ずべき存在となった従者を取り除くのです。陛下は絶望の時にやってこられた。それは不死の者からの印。陛下だけが、かつてキベラと呼ばれた者に、永遠の死を与えられるのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.locale_text: {n}楽しげな笑い声が邪魔をする。{/n}「言葉はもう十分です、ドミン・{name}。恥ずべき存在となった従者を取り除くのです。陛下は絶望の時にやってこられた。それは不死の者からの印。陛下だけが、かつてキベラと呼ばれた者に、永遠の死を与えられるのです」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}你的话语被幸灾乐祸的大笑声打断了。{/n}“够了，秘者{name}，让你的仆人从屈辱中获得解脱吧。你在绝望的时刻来到了她面前，这一定是不死之神的旨意。只有你，才能为这个曾经叫做‘绮贝菈’的人带来最终的死亡。”
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话语被幸灾乐祸的大笑声打断了。{/n}“够了，秘者{name}，让你的仆人从屈辱中获得解脱吧。你在绝望的时刻来到了她面前，这一定是不死之神的旨意。只有你，才能为这个曾经叫做‘绮贝菈’的人带来最终的死亡。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Du wirst von hämischem Gelächter unterbrochen.{/n} "Genug geredet, Domin'{name}. Befreit Eure Dienerin von ihrer jämmerlichen Existenz. Ihr seid in einer Stunde der Verzweiflung gekommen, und das ist ein Zeichen des Todlosen. Ihr allein könnt der Frau, die eist Kibellah genannt wurde, den Tod gewähren."
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du wirst von hämischem Gelächter unterbrochen.{/n} "Genug geredet, Domin'{name}. Befreit Eure Dienerin von ihrer jämmerlichen Existenz. Ihr seid in einer Stunde der Verzweiflung gekommen, und das ist ein Zeichen des Todlosen. Ihr allein könnt der Frau, die eist Kibellah genannt wurde, den Tod gewähren."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Un rire triomphant vous interrompt.{/n} « Assez parlé, Domin'{name}. Libérez votre servante de son existence méprisable. Vous arrivez à l'heure du désespoir, et c'est un signe de l'Immortel. Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez accorder la mort véritable à celle qui fut autrefois Kibellah. »
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire triomphant vous interrompt.{/n} « Assez parlé, Domin'{name}. Libérez votre servante de son existence méprisable. Vous arrivez à l'heure du désespoir, et c'est un signe de l'Immortel. Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez accorder la mort véritable à celle qui fut autrefois Kibellah. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Alienation

languages.text: {n}Sinsi bir kahkaha, sözlerini bölüyor.{/n} "Bu kadar konuşmak yeter Domin'{name}. Hizmetkârının bu utanç dolu varlığını sonlandır. Umutsuzlukla dolu bir saatte geldin ve bu da Ölmeyen'den bir işarettir. Bir zamanlar ismi Kibellah olan varlığa son ölümünü yalnızca sen bahşedebilirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Gloating laughter interrupts you.{/n} "Enough words, Domin'{name}. Rid your servant of her shameful existence. You have come in an hour of despair, and that is a sign from the Undying One. Only you can grant the one who was once called Kibellah her final death."
